item.apotheotic_additions.apotheotic_coi: Found in Rogue Spawners, used with the Wandering Trader.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:moon: We Are Going To Steal THE MOON
advancements.apotheotic_additions:moon.d: Use the Despicable Jewel to commit the crime of the century.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:smithi: Find a Smithing Template, usable within a Smithing Table to upgrade gear.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:apothe: How We're Going To Pay Last Years Rent
Obtain an Apotheotic Coin, capable of trading with villagers for loot.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:infuse: Obtain an Infused Coin, capable of trading with villagers for rare loot.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:ascend: Obtain an Ascended Coin, capable of trading with villagers for very rare loot.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:esoter: Find an Esoteric affix item, containing infinite power.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:artifa: Find an Artifact affix item, containing very high stat boosts.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:heirlo: Obtain an Heirloom affix item, containing one very strong affix.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:artifa: Aquire an Artifact Quality gem; this can only be an Apotheotic Additions Jewel.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:heirlo: Aquire an Heirloom Quality gem; this can only be an Apotheotic Additions Jewel.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:esoter: Aquire an Esoteric Quality gem; this can only be an Apotheotic Additions Jewel.
affix.apotheotic_additions:breaker/speci: Breaking Stone has a %s%% chance to drop a Ambrosium Shard instead.
affix.apotheotic_additions:wand/tracking: Up to {0} projectiles will seek out the nearest enemy.
affix.apotheotic_additions:heavy_weapon/: of Ar Ar Ar Ar Ar
of Sugar, Spice, and Everything Nice

Breaking Iron Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Zanite Gemstones instead.

Breaking Silver Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Arcane Essence instead.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/thermal: Breaking Nickel Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Basalz Shards instead.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/decay.p: Breaking Stone/Cobblestone has a %s%% chance to drop Depthrock instead.

gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/witch_q: Breaking Moon Stone has a %s%% chance to drop Mysterious Scrap Metal instead.

gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/despica: Breaking ??? has a %s%% chance to STEAL THE MOOOOOON

curios.modifiers.an_focus: When worn as a Spell Focus
effect.born_in_chaos_v1.rotten_smell.des: Summons hostile Corpse Flies at random intervals.
effect.born_in_chaos_v1.infernal_flame.d: Causes Fire damage that cannot be removed by water.
effect.born_in_chaos_v1.stun.desc: Applies very high Weakness and Slowness.
effect.rats.plague.desc: Spreads to hit targets, preventing health regeneration and turning rats hostile.
effect.voidscape.aura.desc: Surrounds you in a void aura that damages creatures nearby.
effect.alexscaves.irradiated.desc: Prevents health regeneration and makes you glow.
effect.alexscaves.rage.desc: Increases damage based on how low your hp is.
effect.botania.soul_cross.desc: Heals you when you kill something
effect.botania.emptiness.desc: Suppresses natural mob spawns around you.
effect.botania.bloodthirst.desc: Natural mob spawns around you ignore lighting and other conditions.
effect.botania.allure.desc: Catch fishing loot and treasure twice as fast.
alexsmobs.potion.soulsteal.desc: Heals you for an amount equal to how much damage you deal.
alexsmobs.potion.oiled.desc: Float in water and Levitate in rain.
effect.aether.inebriation.desc: Deals light damage, and causes you to randomly move.
effect.undergarden.virulence.desc: Deals medium nonlethal damage, and turns your hearts purple.
effect.cataclysm.abyssal_curse.desc: Deals light damage, and turns your hearts purple.
effect.cataclysm.blessing_of_amethyst.de: Grants immunity to Darkness, Abyssal Burn, and Abyssal Fear.
effect.immersiveengineering.flammable.de: Increases fire damage taken from fire damage over time.
